title: Microsoft Defender no longer flags Tor Browser as malware
description: For Windows users who frequently use the TorBrowser, there's been a pressing concern. Recent versions of the TorBrowser, specifically because of the tor.exe file it contained, were being flagged as potential threats by Windows Defender. [...]

title: Exim patches three of six zero-day bugs disclosed last week
description: Exim developers have released patches for three of the zero-days disclosed last week through Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative (ZDI), one of them allowing unauthenticated attackers to gain remote code execution. [...]

title: New BunnyLoader threat emerges as a feature-rich malware-as-a-service
description: Security researchers discovered a new malware-as-a-service (MaaS) named 'BunnyLoader' advertised on multiple hacker forums as a fileless loader that can steal and replace the contents of the system clipboard. [...]

title: Ransomware gangs now exploiting critical TeamCity RCE flaw
description: Ransomware gangs are now targeting a recently patched critical vulnerability in JetBrains' TeamCity continuous integration and deployment server. [...]

title: Exploit available for critical WS_FTP bug exploited in attacks
description: Over the weekend, security researchers released a proof-of-concept (PoC) exploit for a maximum severity vulnerability in Progress Software's WS_FTP Server file sharing solution. [...]

title: Arm warns of Mali GPU flaws likely exploited in targeted attacks
description: Arm in a security advisory today is warning of an actively exploited vulnerability affecting the widely-used Mali GPU drivers. [...]

title: Motel One discloses data breach following ransomware attack
description: The Motel One Group has announced that it has been targeted by ransomware actors who managed to steal some customer data, including the details of 150 credit cards. [...]

title: FBI warns of surge in 'phantom hacker' scams impacting elderly
description: The FBI issued a public service announcement warning of a significant increase in 'phantom hacker' scams targeting senior citizens across the United States. [...]
